nodes.text: Backpacks, also known as knapsacks, were portable storage compartments with two straps that let them be worn on users' backs. Backpacks were used in such notable occasions such as when Luke Skywalker used his backpack during his Jedi training on Dagobah.
Backpacks were used also throughout the Clone Wars by clone troopers and Jedi, notably when Ahsoka Tano used a backpack as a way to store Rotta the Huttlet.
